outputs.name: recipe
outputs.description:
A simulation recipe that contains a simulation instructions and
input arguments. Use the "HB Run Recipe" component to execute the
recipe and get results.

inputs.name: _model
inputs.description:
A Honeybee Model for which Annual Daylight will be simulated.
Note that this model should have grids assigned to it in order
to produce meaningfule results.

inputs.name: _wea
inputs.description:
A Honeybee-Radiance Wea object produced from the Wea components
that are under the the Light Sources tab.

inputs.name: north_
inputs.description:
A number between -360 and 360 for the counterclockwise
difference between the North and the positive Y-axis in degrees.
90 is West and 270 is East. Note that this is different than the
convention used in EnergyPlus, which uses clockwise difference
instead of counterclockwise difference. This can also be Vector
for the direction to North.
Default [0]

inputs.name: _sensor_grids_
inputs.description:
Data type [string]
A list of input grid display names to simulate. If None, all grids
within the input _model will be simulated.
Default [None]

inputs.name: sensor_count_
inputs.description:
Data type [string]
The maximum number of grid points per parallel execution.
Default [200]

inputs.name: radiance_parameters_
inputs.description:
Data type [string]
Text with the radiance parameters for ray tracing.
Default [-ab 2]

name: HB Direct Sunlight
description: Run a direct sun study for a single model.
